name: Bounce (itch) (Rebunkee)
description:
Bounce is a semi short platforming game built around bouncing. 

You're in a gameshow, and all you have to do is get to the end! Sounds like fun!

Controls:

WASD for movement, escape for pausing and space for jumping! No controller functionality, yet.

It's my first project, so expect it to be a little rough around the edges. 

I would like to thank my close friends for their idea's and playtesting!
